name: Hungary
startIntroPart1: Maganimous King Matthias Corvinus of Hungary, your shining legacy is everlasting. When you came to the Magyar throne, your nation was going through a tumultuous time, threatened as it was from all sides; seeing this with perfect clarity, you established a permanent professional army, and thus the fearsome mercenary Black Army was born: unusual in its size and comparison, it famously incorporated the use of muskets. But perhaps the pinnacle of your reign is the fact that you made Hungary the first country outside Italy to adopt the principles of the Renaissance: learned men from all countries, not just Italy itself, travelled to Hungary to talk about arts, and your legendary library was rivaled only by that of Venice.
startIntroPart2: King Matthias the Just, God has called upon you to usher a new epoch of absolute greatness by calling upon your loyal people and lead them to glory? Can you rebuild your legendary library and at the same time let the Black Army serve as both a sword against your enemies and a shield protecting your nation? Can you build a civilization that will stand the test of time?
declaringWar: I can't tolerate you anymore, hopefully you are at least a worthy opponent!
attacked: It can not be true, but I feel it is. We will do our best to fend you off!
defeated: The bitter taste of defeat. You will taste it as well. Someday...
introduction: You stand in front of Matthias Corvinus, the great king of Hungary. Are you a friend or a foe?
hateYes: I never reject a good offer.
afterPeace: Let's celebrate this glorious day, when our nations decided to sign a peace treaty!
tradeRequest: I've got an offer. Are you interested?

name: Norway
declaringWar: Now comes a storm you cannot escape. You can only hope for a quick death! To victory! To Odin's halls!
attacked: This will make a great saga! The skalds will sing of my valor! Let us see if the same will go to you!
defeated: Joke's on you. I will join the einherjar in Valhalla and feast, while you toil away here.
introduction: Harald Sigurdsson stands before you: a Viking unlike any the seas and lands have ever known. Hah, are you afraid?
tradeRequest: I have sent you traders with gifts of rune stones. They are powerful. I mean, the stones, not the traders.

name: Ireland
startIntroPart1: Few can boast your patriotism and commitment to the cause of a Free Ireland, Commander Collins. Though you came from the humblest of beginnings, you truly embodied the pride of Irishness. It was not long before you joined the struggle for Home Rule, and you began to build a reputation for yourself â€“ one of dedication, devotion, and pride for Ireland. After the Easter Rising turned bloody, you managed to turn a beaten movement into a potent physical force, one that would successfully found an Irish nation, fight a war for liberation, and win independence. Some did not share your view, however, and soon this incomplete nation descended once more into war. And though you paid the ultimate cost in the subsequent civil war, you gave your life for a free state that was established soon after.
startIntroPart2: Michael Collins, Ireland looks up to you again for guidance in a new time of hardship. Will you serve once more for your nation and your people? Will you overcome those that seek to shackle you? Can you build a civilization that will stand the test of time?
declaringWar: I hope you have no hard feelings for me. This is a cruel world, after all...
attacked: So once again it befalls onto me to fight for my people.
defeated: I signed my own death warrant long ago. I thought at the time how odd, how ridiculous, a bullet might just as well have done the job 5 years ago...
introduction: Welcome! I am Michael Collins, Chairman Of Provisional Government in Ireland. We could get along quite well if you're a friend of Ireland.
tradeRequest: This moment of peace must not be wasted between us, so let us make the most of it.
